program.gdbClientOtherCommands:
set mem inaccessible-by-default off
target remote localhost:3333
mon reset halt
load
mon reset
quit

erase.gdbClientOtherCommands:
set mem inaccessible-by-default off
target remote localhost:3333
mon reset halt
mon erase --chip
mon reset
quit
